name: gyunu-boilerplate
description: A basic webpack and sass boilerplate.

scripts.build:js: npm run lint:js && rm -rf src/js && rm -rf dist/js && webpack --config webpack.build.js
scripts.deploy:js: npm run lint:js && rm -rf src/js/ && rm -rf dist/assets/js/* && webpack --config webpack.deploy.js
scripts.watch: parallelshell 'npm run -s build:js -- -w' 'npm run -s build:css -- -w' 'npm run live-reload'
scripts.deploy: npm run -s deploy:css && npm run -s deploy:js && npm run -s deploy:img && npm run -s deploy:font

author: Gyunu
